alert.note: Alert for Eastern Las Animas County; La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet; Trinidad Vicinity, Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 4:34PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Otero, central Las Animas and southeastern Pueblo Counties through 515 PM MDT... At 434 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles north of Timpas to near Tyrone. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Delhi, Timpas, Thatcher and Tyrone. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: Strong winds may spread well ahead of any precipitation or lightning. If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Las Animas County; La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet; Trinidad Vicinity, Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft
